term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - base unit of measurement
term.title: base unit

item.text: Unit of measurement of a base quantity in a given system of quantities. By international agreement, a set of seven dimensionally independent units form the SI base units: the metre, kilogram, second, ampere, kelvin, mole and candela.
